feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
